title: 07/24 Choosing between Kirk Cousins or Carson Palmer, Cowboys regression coming
description:
In the inaugural episode of the Pick-Six Podcast, the CBS Sports crew (Pete Prisco, Jason LaCanfora, Will Brinson, Nick Kostos) take a look at the biggest storylines from around the NFL, including Le'Veon Bell's contract situation (2:00 minute mark), Mike Williams injury and the Chargers bad luck (7:30) and Eric Dickerson's plan for the Rams quarterback situation (14:35). Then they decide if they are "In or Out" on various training camp storylines including a possible regression season by the Cowboys (25:00), the Panthers GM situation and how it will affect the locker room and team in 2017 (29:50), Tom Savage starting Week 1 for the Texans (38:30), choosing between Carson Palmer or Kirk Cousins (45:15) and whether the Patriots are the prohibitive favorites to win the Super Bowl (50:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
